org.contentmine.graphics.svg.plot

Class Axis

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.plot.Axis

  • public class Axis
extends java.lang.Object
    an axis on a graph. Normally horizontal or vertical. Being refactored from old version.

    pm286
